meanings.definition: Not able to be categorized or classified.
meanings.sent1: The strange creature was truly unclassifiable in the eyes of the scientists.
meanings.sent2: The artwork was so unique that it was deemed unclassifiable by the art critics.
meanings.sent3: The unclassifiable mix of colors in the painting made everyone scratch their heads in confusion.
meanings.sent4: Her unconventional fashion sense was as unclassifiable as a rainbow in a black-and-white world.
meanings.sent5: The unclassifiable beauty of the sunset left us all in awe.

meanings.definition: Impossible to assign to a particular category.
meanings.sent1: The new music genre was so innovative that it was unclassifiable by traditional standards.
meanings.sent2: The mysterious object found in the forest was unclassifiable by any known classification system.
meanings.sent3: The unclassifiable mix of flavors in the dish left everyone puzzled but intrigued.
meanings.sent4: Her unclassifiable talent for storytelling was like trying to capture a shooting star.
meanings.sent5: The unclassifiable nature of his personality made him an enigma to all who knew him.
